Classes¶

class lcmc.calculators.calculator¶
class lcmc.calculators.emt_calculator(atoms)¶
class lcmc.calculators.vasp_calculator(atoms, dir, command)¶

perform energy calculations using the VASP

Attributes:

  • atoms (ASE Atoms): The ASE Atoms object representing the atomic structure

  • dir (str): Directory for VASP calculations

  • command (str): command to run VASP.

calculate_dE(Ei, Ef)¶

Calculate the energy difference (dE) between two energy values.

Args:

Ei (float): Initial energy value. Ef (float): Final energy value.

Returns:

float: The energy difference (dE).

calculate_energy(mc_step)¶

Calculate the energy of the atomic structure for a given Monte Carlo (MC) step using VASP.

Args:

mc_step (int): The Monte Carlo step for which the energy is calculated.

Returns:

float: The calculated energy.

property structure¶

Get the ASE Atoms object representing the atomic structure.

Returns:

ASE Atoms: The atomic structure.
